properties.business_purpose: Address management for shipping and billing purposes
properties.description: This table stores user addresses for shipping and billing purposes. It includes details such as address type, full name, phone number, address lines, landmark, city, state, pincode, default status, and timestamp of creation.
typical_queries: What is my delivery address?

Can I change my shipping address?

Combines user, orders, and payments for easy access to order summary information
properties.suggested_sql: CREATE VIEW user_order_summary AS SELECT u.user_id, o.order_number, o.order_date, o.total_amount, p.payment_method FROM users u JOIN orders o ON u.user_id = o.user_id JOIN payments p ON o.order_id = p.order_id;
properties.use_case: Answers common questions like 'What is the total amount spent by each user?' or 'Which payment methods are most commonly used?'

properties.description: Pre-aggregates product and category data for analytics purposes
properties.suggested_sql: CREATE VIEW popular_products_categories AS SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, c.category_name, COUNT(oi.order_item_id) as number_of_sales FROM products p JOIN order_items oi ON p.product_id = oi.product_id JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.category_id GROUP BY p.product_id, c.category_name ORDER BY number_of_sales DESC;
properties.use_case: Helps answer questions like 'What are the top-selling products by category?' or 'Which categories have the most sales overall?'

properties.description: Simplifies complex relationships between user, wishlist, and cart
properties.suggested_sql: CREATE VIEW user_wishlist_cart_overlap AS SELECT u.user_id, w.product_id, CASE WHEN wi.added_at IS NOT NULL THEN 'Wishlisted' ELSE 'In Cart' END as product_status FROM users u JOIN wishlist w ON u.user_id = w.user_id LEFT JOIN cart c ON w.product_id = c.product_id WHERE c.product_id IS NULL UNION SELECT u.user_id, c.product_id, 'In Cart' as product_status FROM users u JOIN cart c ON u.user_id = c.user_id LEFT JOIN wishlist w ON c.product_id = w.product_id WHERE w.product_id IS NULL;
properties.use_case: Answers questions like 'Which products are in a user's cart and wishlist?' or 'How many products does each user have in both their cart and wishlist?'
